name: HepatitisBVirusInfectionCombinationTestsThatIncludeHepatitisBVirusNucleicAcid
title: Hepatitis B Virus Infection (Combination Tests that include hepatitis B virus Nucleic Acid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of hepatitis B virus Nucleic Acid in combination with at least one other organism.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: hepatitis B virus Nucleic Acid),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
